product.name: Framed Colorful Abstract Wall Art, Set of 3 Mid Century Modern Canvas Prints, Famous Art Paintings for Living Room, Bedroom, Hallway, Dining Room, Office Wall Decor, 16x24 Inch
product.description:
Integrate art into life, let the wall become the soul of your home.
Each wall tells a story, each painting embodies emotions.
Once upon a time, in the heart of 2019, a group of passionate art enthusiasts embarked on a journey to create something truly special. They dreamt of a world where beauty and creativity were accessible to everyone, not just those who could afford pricey galleries or exclusive exhibitions. Thus, Cuspin was born, with a mission to bring the wonders of art and home decor to every corner of homes across the globe.
product.bullet_points:
• [Framed Wall Art]: A set of 3 framed colorful abstract wall art, each measuring 16x24 inches, 3 pieces totaling 24x48 inches. The frame is made of durable and sturdy material, paired with a simple and stylish black frame, which can be perfectly integrated with various decorative styles.
• [Canvas Artwork for Walls]: Our artwork is made of waterproof canvas, which is moisture-proof and easy to maintain. This canvas has a unique texture that enhances the visual effect of the image, makes the color more saturated, keeps the painting colorful for a long time, and is not easy to fade or damage.
• [As Great As The Picture]: Each framed wall painting has a unique color matching and color block segmentation, through bold colors, geometric shapes and complex pattern designs, such as green, orange, blue and other bright colors and unique designs make the whole set of works stand out. This is a set of triptychs that can be displayed as a group or hung separately to adapt to different space layouts, paired with a simple, stylish and versatile black frame, it is very suitable as a wall decoration for various scenes such as living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, study, office, hotel, bar, etc.
• [Ready to Hang]: Each painting is framed for you. After receiving it, you can hang it up and decorate your beautiful home very easily.
• [Gifting]: This set of Mid century modern wall art prints are a perfect choice for your new home decoration, or you can also give them to relatives and friends when they move to a new home.
